name: Informed K12
headline: Workflow software to help districts keep up with the pace of changeâ¦
description:
At Informed K12, weâre on a mission to help school district administrators operate efficiently and gain insight into their most critical school business processes. Still today, most school districts have hundreds of mission critical processes that run on paper, making visibility and improvement near impossible.

We transform paperwork from a daily stumbling block to a strategic tool. This makes it possible to hire the right teachers faster, manage bus routes for students without permanent housing, ensure teachers get reimbursed and paid on time, and a lot more. We are powering the future of school district operations by helping district administrators drive the systemic change needed to improve productivity, accountability and equity.

## Eliminate paperwork. Get informed.
We help school district administrators operate efficiently and gain insight into their most critical school business processes.
[Sign up for a demo](http://www.informedk12.com/<https:/www.informedk12.com/cs/c/?cta_guid=aaef4aa7-86f5-466a-808c-43355bbf5c00&signature=AAH58kG4kjGAjr1QUzrVUqHAACh_c-1BvA&portal_id=2532531&pageId=5206785055&placement_guid=4d252f2f-f97c-459c-8d54-997e6298dfb7&click=d4a95359-cac1-41c4-86c6-312429c38e56&redirect_url=APefjpHHyHoaB97Qhsg81AevG4pdvI-qzK3Gaej2H4xFd7KQyqLrRkw38Gm2BnSzEvtezauc1jMoukwAU7FFxCBH-aqkCJmW6Q5WDHqKfhWJj3nSWkrBSV3oiKH6kq10-pyz8UkcHyYK&hsutk=&canon=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.informedk12.com%2F&ts=1739981560725> "Sign up for a demo")
### Now you can automate, track, and measure with ease
Informed K12 is an easy-to-use workflow automation and digital forms solution that helps school district administrators to:
  * Manage all forms and paperwork electronically
  * Automate critical school business processes
  * Track approval workflows across departments


![page-404-tablet-banner](https://www.informedk12.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets%20%5BJune-17%5D/page-404-tablet-banner.png?width=768&name=page-404-tablet-banner.png)
Uncover insights in your paperwork
![home-product-desktop.jpg](http://www.informedk12.com/hubfs/Assets%20%5B%20Sep%2017%20%5D/Optimized%20Images/home-product-desktop-1.jpg)
![productivity](https://www.informedk12.com/hubfs/Assets%20%5BJune-17%5D/productivity.png)
### Productivity Work efficiently, gain time
Capture data accurately, automate workflows, streamline and standardize processes, and communicate seamlessly across departments and the district.
![accountability](https://www.informedk12.com/hubfs/Assets%20%5BJune-17%5D/accountability.png)
### accountability Measure, track, improve
See where resources are going, where approvals are being held up and just how long things are taking. Use these insights to boost efficiency throughout your district.
![equity](https://www.informedk12.com/hubfs/Assets%20%5BJune-17%5D/equity.png)
### equity Make informed decisions
Get a clear picture so resources are distributed in a fair and equitable way. Ensure that teachers, supplies and facilities are going where they are needed most.
[About our product](http://www.informedk12.com/<https:/www.informedk12.com/cs/c/?cta_guid=67ef1451-5f2a-457f-9785-c5280c26e053&signature=AAH58kGUCB_L1F8NLoTI8MqN-1WcrBWfdw&portal_id=2532531&pageId=5206785055&placement_guid=dc05091f-fdaf-4e54-8ec9-4fd4bd2b1474&click=62e4de59-c01e-4782-a601-3b6708360656&redirect_url=APefjpE0YzbTVnVZc0Pp6XFjxV0-DLGcvXI-pNo7wl-MPzOujuldaJtCkLYasFF24Spin9IB9Yj1FzQtk4eYmDwg9nYF4wCgrkghEhLRMDPZ_coOSysnNpkOo3Te4StLpScMUc9rv020&hsutk=&canon=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.informedk12.com%2F&ts=1739981560717> "About our product")

##### Human Resources
Deliver excellent hiring and onboarding with a focus on people not paper.
[More](http://www.informedk12.com/<https:/www.informedk12.com/human-resources?hsLang=en-us>)
![Student Services](https://www.informedk12.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets%20%5BJune-17%5D/Student%20Services.png?width=164&name=Student%20Services.png)

Free teachers and staff to do their jobs. Watch engagement and satisfaction rise.
[More](http://www.informedk12.com/<https:/www.informedk12.com/student-services?hsLang=en-us>)

  * How to define key performance indicators (KPIs)
  * Best practices for automating routine workflows

generated_description:
Informed K12 is a forward-thinking company on a mission to revolutionize how school districts operate. Founded in 2012 and based in Oakland, CA, the company focuses on providing workflow software that replaces cumbersome paper processes with efficient digital solutions. Their tools help school administrators streamline critical operations—from hiring teachers swiftly to managing school bus routes for transient students. 

Imagine a world where paper isn’t a bottleneck but rather a strategic tool that enhances transparency and accountability. That’s what Informed K12 is bringing to the table. They’re all about helping school districts navigate change, ensuring that processes are automated, tracked, and optimized across departments. Their commitment extends to promoting equity, allowing resources and support to be allocated where they’re most needed.

The company is part of the Y Combinator Batch IK12 and has grown to a team of 70 dedicated individuals. They are tagged under various categories including education and B2B SaaS, emphasizing their role in modernizing education systems.

Informed K12’s software provides districts with the capability to manage forms electronically, automate approval workflows, and glean insights from previously hidden data in paper-based processes. This unique offering not only boosts productivity but improves overall resource allocation and decision-making.

To learn more or see how they can assist your district, visit [Informed K12's website](http://www.informedk12.com).
